User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and draft content
Disallow: /norobots/
Disallow: /_drafts/
Disallow: /admin/

# Allow important pages for Leonam Vasquez personal branding
Allow: /about/
Allow: /posts/
Allow: /categories/
Allow: /tags/

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://leonam.cloud/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://leonam.cloud/feed.xml
